meanings.definition: A person who advocates for or is a supporter of regionalism.
meanings.sent1: Many regionalists believe in the importance of preserving local traditions.
meanings.sent2: The regionalists in our town work together to promote our unique culture.
meanings.sent3: The regionalists at the meeting shared stories about their favorite local foods.
meanings.sent4: She was a true regionalist, always championing the customs of her hometown.
meanings.sent5: The group of regionalists organized a festival to celebrate the history of their region.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to regionalism or regional characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The artist's regionalist paintings captured the beauty of the countryside.
meanings.sent2: The architecture of the building had a distinct regionalist style.
meanings.sent3: The regionalist decorations in the room gave it a cozy and welcoming feel.
meanings.sent4: Her regionalist approach to cooking focused on using locally sourced ingredients.
meanings.sent5: The regionalist music festival showcased the diverse talents of local musicians.
